title: Looking after ourselves
creator_credit: Janet Isaac, Penny Chapman, South Australian Film Corporation and 1:1 Films
brief_description: A film about women in medicine and how the Women’s Community Health Centre in Adelaide is working, how it aims to give women more effective knowledge and control of their bodies and health.
creator_credit_for_label: Janet Isaac, Penny Chapman, South Australian Film Corporation and 1:1 Films
